title: Science frontier = Frontieres de la science
creator_credit: Christina L McCaughey and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A film that shows the civilian application of technology developed by the Research Section of the Department of National Defense such as: SONAR respirators; Malcolm Horizon; freeze-dried food; cathodic hull protection; and combat glasses.
